title: Bangabandhu Dhaka Marathon 2026
details: Held annually in Dhaka, this marathon honors Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman. It features full and half marathons, 10K, wheelchair, and virtual races. Organized by the Bangladesh Army, it promotes health, unity, and global participation. Runners receive medals, certificates, and prizes, making it a celebration of fitness, national pride, and sporting spirit.

title: Ultra Trail Gaspesia 100 2025
details: UTG100 is a premier trail event in Quebec’s Gaspésie region. It includes races from 5K to 100 miles through scenic parks and UNESCO sites. Runners of all levels enjoy breathtaking views, technical trails, and warm community support. With medals, stage options, and festive vibes, it offers a unique ultra-endurance adventure each year.

title: The Klondike Ultra 2025
details: Set in Alberta’s Sandhills Wildland Park, this race includes 6K to 100K events through forests, sand dunes, and riverside trails. The 100K features 2,880m elevation gain and safety rules like bear spray. With cutoff times, aid stations, and medals, the event blends challenge, nature, and camaraderie in a rugged wilderness setting.
